publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4887 George Lyon: Legislative and Regulatory Reform Bill Legislative Consent Motion - UK Government Legislation—That the Parliament agrees that the relevant provisions in the Legislative and Regulatory Reform Bill introduced in the House of Commons on 11 January 2006, that relate to the implementation of European Union obligations and which are within the legislative competence of the Scottish Parliament, or which confer executive powers on the Scottish Ministers, should be considered by the UK Parliament. Supported by: Mr Tom McCabe*

S2M-4887 George Lyon: Legislative and Regulatory Reform Bill Legislative Consent Motion - UK Government Legislation—That the Parliament agrees that the relevant provisions in the Legislative and Regulatory Reform Bill introduced in the House of Commons on 11 January 2006, that relate to the implementation of European Union obligations and which are within the legislative competence of the Scottish Parliament, or which confer executive powers on the Scottish Ministers, should be considered by the UK Parliament. Supported by: Mr Tom McCabe
